The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka  
ɼ  ලංකා  ȝජාතාǦƵක  සමාජවා Ǐ  ජනරජ ෙɏ  ගැසŸ  පƴ ය 
අƯ ɪෙශෂ   
අංක 2145/32- 2019 ඔúෙතʤබə මස 16 වැǧ බදාදා - 2019.10.16 
 
  NO. 2145/32 –  WEDNESDAY, OCTOBER 16, 2019 
EXTRAORDINARY 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk 
1A 
(Published by Authority) 
 
PART I : SECTION (I)  —  GENERAL 
 
Government  Notifications 
 
PG 4710 —  117 (2019/10) 
 
Forest Conservation Ordinance 
 
THE order under Section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordina nce (Chapter 451), 
as No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 199 5 and No. 65 of 
2009 that have to be read with Section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of 
Sri Lanka. 
 
 
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by Section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as amended by Acts, 
No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, that have to be read 
with Section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri La nka,                       
I, Maithripala Sirisena, President do by this order declare the Kalu Ganga Forest of 1611.384 Hectar es bounded by the 
limit set forth in the Schedule here to as Kalu Ganga  Reserved Forest from 12th day of   October 2019. 
 
 
 MAITHRIPALA SIRISENA, 
 President. 
 
 
12th day of  October, 2019, 
Polonnaruwa. 

<!-- page 2 -->

Extent: 1611.384 ha. 
 
11-80/1 
 
 
 
 
Forest Conservation Ordinance 
 
THE order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordina nce (Chapter 451), 
as No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995  and No. 65 of 
2009 that have to be read with Section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of 
Sri Lanka. 
 
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as amended by Acts, 
No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, t hat have to be 
read with Section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of S ri Lanka,                       
I, Maithripala Sirisena, President do by this order declare the Hobaragoda Forest of 4523.773 hectar es bounded by the 
limit set forth in the schedule here to as Hobaragoda Reserved Forest from 12th day of October 2019. 
 
 
 MAITHRIPALA SIRISENA, 
 President. 
 
 
Polonnaruwa, 
12th day of  October, 2019. 
 
 
Schedule 
 
The state land area of 4523.773 ha. Located within Laggala Divisional Secretary’s Division of Matale  District, Central 
Province in Sri Lanka located Within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates (Survey  method – 
Geodesic coordinates EPSG : 5234 method).

11-80/2 
 

<!-- page 6 -->

6 A I ෙකʣටස : (I) ෙඡදය - ɼ ලංකා ȝජාතාǦƵක සමාජවාǏ ජනරජෙɏ අƯ ɪෙශෂ ගැසŸ පƴය - 2019.10.16 
PART  I : Sec (I) – GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIS T REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 16.10.2019 
Forest Conservation Ordinance 
 
THE order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordina nce (Chapter 451), 
as No 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No 13 of 1982, No 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 a nd No. 65 of 
2009 that have to be read with Section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of 
Sri Lanka. 
 
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as amended by Acts, 
No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, t hat have to be 
read with Section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of S ri Lanka,I 
Maithripala Sirisena, President do by this order declare the Karagasthenna Forest of 1832.936 hectar es bounded by the 
limit set forth in the schedule here to as Karagasthenna Reserved Forest from 12th day of October 2019. 
 
 
 MAITHRIPALA SIRISENA, 
 President. 
 
 
Polonnaruwa, 
12th day of  October, 2019. 
 
 
Schedule 
 
The state land area of 1832.936ha. Located within Laggala Divisional Secretary’s Division of Matale District, Central 
Province in Sri Lanka located Within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates (Survey  method – 
Geodesic coordinates EPSG : 5234 method) 
 
The State land area surrounded by the straight line formed by joining the points that start from(E.1 93335, N.266618)up 
to (E.193503, N.266577), (E.193507, N.266576), (E.193511, N.266558), (E.193510, N.266558), (E.193514, N.266536), 
(E.193495, N.266518), (E.193472, N.266490), (E.193477, N.266449), (E.193492, N.266420), (E.193503, N .266419),

(E.193434, N.265857), (E.193424, N.266119), (E.193384, N.266347)And from there up to starting point( E.193335, 
N.266618). 
 
Extent: 1832.936 Hectare 
 
11-80/3 
 
 
Forest Conservation Ordinance 
 
THE order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64. (1) of the Forest Conservation Ordin ance (Chapter 451), 
as No 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No 13 of 1982, No 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 a nd No. 65 of 
2009 that have to be read with Section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of 
Sri Lanka. 
 
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) as  amended by Acts, 
No. 13 of 1966, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, that have to be read 
with Section 51 of the 19th amendment of the Constitution of Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka, I, Maithripala 
Sirisena, President do by this order declare the Medaulpatha Forest of 1273.462 hectares bounded by the limit set forth in 
the schedule here to as Medaulpatha Reserved Forest from 12th day of October 2019. 
 
 
 MAITHRIPALA SIRISENA, 
 President. 
 
 
Polonnaruwa, 
12th day of  October, 2019. 

<!-- page 10 -->

10 A I ෙකʣටස : (I) ෙඡදය - ɼ ලංකා ȝජාතාǦƵක සමාජවාǏ ජනරජෙɏ අƯ ɪෙශෂ ගැසŸ පƴය - 2019.10.16 
PART  I : Sec (I) – GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIS T REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 16.10.2019 
Schedule 
 
The state land area of 1273.462 ha. Located within Laggala Divisional Secretary’s Division of Mathal e District,         
Central Province in Sri Lanka located Within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates (Survey method – 
Geodesic coordinates EPSG : 5234 method) 
 
The land area surrounded by the straight line formed by joining the points that meet coordinates(207 956E, 270528N) 
and Kalu Ganga by North and from there along Kalu Ganga upto the point where Wasgamuwa National Park  meets 
(208350E, 272061N) and from there to East along the boundary of the Wasgamuwa National Park up to co ordinates 
(210022E, 265835N) Which is located by South and from there coordinates (210022E, 265635N), (209672 E, 265835N) 
(209672E, 265827N), (209571E, 265861N), (209548E, 265957N), (209538E, 266100N), (209542E, 266323N), 
(209529E, 266485N), (209498E, 266564N), (209496E, 266714N), (209456E,266843N), (209395E, 267022N), 
(209352E, 267123N), (209353E, 267210N), (209289E, 267377N), (209393E, 267597N), (209417E, 267726N), 
(209413E, 267914N), (209485E, 268151N), (209449E, 268420N), (208713E, 268630N), (208706E, 268865N), 
(208710E, 268998N), (208702E, 269120N), (208714E, 269238N), (208652E, 269522N), (208677E, 269702N), 
(208495E, 269732N), (208298E, 269867N), (208175E, 269901N), (207871E, 270108N), (207920E, 270338N) u p to 
(207956E, 270528N) 
 
Extent: 1273.462 ha.
